actions.text: Toggle the monster mouth state.
Spawn a new bones block inside the monster mouth.
Link the bones block to the monster mouth by making their IDs identical.
Move the bones block towards the next direction stored in the monster mouth object, by iterating through each value based on the current step.
Move to the next step.
Change the monster mouth animation.
Reset the monster mouth animation after a specific amount of time, which is defined by multiplying the tweening duration by the amount of bones blocks.

children.text: Spawn various types of effects to illustrate the interaction between the player and the monster mouth.

actions.text: Spawn very small blinking particles.

Expand the smoke.

children.text: Move the smoke upwards to simulate a natural atmosphere.
Shrink the smoke to enhance its fade animation.
Increase the brightness of an object and slowly decrease it until it's back to its previous state.
